title: 如何关闭AntiAura的motd攻击检测
author: 二白丶
txt_content:
能不能AntiAura的关掉motd攻击的检测啊。没了colormotd就很难受.







config.yml


2018-8-27 10:11 上传
点击文件名下载附件




18.69 KB, 下载次数: 1

replies.author: Eric12324
replies.txt_content:
Knockback:
  #Do you want to enable AntiKnockback checking at all?
  Enabled: true

这个关掉

replies.author: 二白丶
replies.txt_content:
Eric12324 发表于 2018-8-28 10:27
Knockback:
  #Do you want to enable AntiKnockback checking at all?
  Enabled: true
这个是防击退
